qlicS: Quantum Logic Ion Control Simulator
===========================================

.. toctree::
   :hidden:
   :maxdepth: 1

   reference
   license

Simulates ion dynamics in LPT with PyLIon and LAMMPS, optimizes with M-LOOP etc.


Installation
------------

To install qlicS,
run this command in your terminal:

.. code-block:: console

   $ pip install qlicS


Usage
-----

To get started run:

.. code-block:: console

   $ qlicS

.. option:: --version

   Display the version and exit.

.. option:: --help

   Display a short usage message and exit.
